answers.answer: I'd appreciate any input from someone who has been in this solution
Sorry to hear that but if babys born now she will be ok... if its bby stopped growing they'll probably section you or induce you.Try not worry too much x
Just went through the same thing, went in for my 33week check up and belly was only measuring 31. Dr scheduled me for a growth ultrasound and bbaby's growth is where it should be.
Thanks for the responses, hopefully the ultrasound will show the same for me.
My ultrasound is scheduled for tomorrow, I really hope it turns out he is at the right size!

I hope everything is okay! I was told I was measuring small at my appointment yesterday. Growth scan is scheduled 2 weeks from now. Fundal height was 29 and I am 32 weeks. I would love to hear an update after your appointment.  Good luck.

My baby is small, he is actually growth restricted from my hypertension and diabetes, I have been considered high risk my whole pregnancy.I have had extra monitoring.  He is small now, but he most likely will gain the weight he needs when he is out.

Iv measured small the whole time.im 31w..and every ultrasound he has been.right were hes spose 2 b in every way..so I wuddnt worry 2 much...I.measure.about 2 weeks.smallr than I shud...but dr also said she expected that cu im small...how small r u measuring??
I'm measuring small too so I have ultrasound and 2 non stress tests a week then my regular ob appt per week til I deliver ... I got 18 days til I'm due so I hope everything is ok.
Thanks for the support. I wouldn't be worried but I'm measuring 27 at almost 32 and that just seems like such a huge difference
Im 24 weeks and was told i am measuring small also. I have a growth ultrasound tomorrow. Hoping she is right on track

question: I'm almost 32 weeks and just had an appointment where I was measuring small. The nurse practitioner said the baby may just be positioned to where she can't get a correct measurement or something could be affecting the babies growth. She referred me to get an ultrasound so they know for sure. Had anyone else dealt with this and should I be worried? I'm scared that something is wrong.
title: Measuring small....?
